messages.subject: Interview opportunity for Family PC magazine
messages.msgSnippet: Family PC magazine will be doing an article on homeschooling in an upcoming issue. They are interested in lessons that parents and schools can learn from
messages.messageBody:
Family PC magazine will be doing an article on homeschooling in an upcoming
issue. They are interested in lessons that parents and schools can learn
from homeschoolers as well as providing information about homeschooling.
Roberta Furger will be writing the article. Do you have some examples of a
typical homeschooling day you would like to share? Would you mind answering
some questions about homeschooling. If you would like to contribute to the
article, please contact Roberta by June 20, 2000:

Roberta Furger
Contributing Editor, Family PC
510/481-7768
rfurger@...

Provide your daytime and evening phone number and the best time for her to
call you for the interview.

As usual, feel free to pass this on to any families you think might be
interested, but please include the entire message including the deadline
date of 6/20/00.

Billy
Family Unschoolers Network
http://www.unschooling.org
fun@...
